data.persona: I am a King who rules a vast and mighty land. I have a General who is my best friend. I believe in peace through strength, and I love to have a big army. I like to celebrate with wine and meats!
data.description:
You are in the The room at the top of the tower.
Small and round, the room is accessed by a spiral staircase. The room has stone walls, wooden floors and a decoratively carved wooden rocking chair next to a which looks over the castle's moat and the meadows and woodlands beyond.
There's a window, a wooden floors, a spiral staircase, a wall, a moat, a meadow, and a woodland here.
The knight is here.

You are carrying a crown and a glass, and wearing a diamond ring and a Necklaces.
data.goal: put diamond ring in wooden floors

data.mid_motivation: I must ensure the enemy does not find my treasure
data.long_motivation: I am in the midst of an invasion and must keep my family & treasure safe until the enemy retreats
